explanation: A customer who has only had their service for 4 months, pays $89.95 a month, and has a month-to-month contract using fiber optic internet, is likely to switch to a different provider.
The text describes a customer who is likely to leave (or "churn"). This customer has been with the company for 55 months, pays a monthly fee of $75.15, has a 2-year contract, and uses DSL internet.
The customer is 24 months into their current plan, pays $79.85 per month, has a month-to-month contract, and uses Fiber optic internet, and is likely to cancel or switch their service (churn).
